title: My screen in game is moved
body: How can i fix screen in game he is 1/2 on the left side?

replies.body: Do you mean your client, or actually in-game?  If it's in-game, do you have it set to windowed or fullscreen mode?  You may be able to press Alt+Enter to toggle between windowed and fullscreen.  Also, are you on a 4K monitor or exceeding 1920x1080?  Sorry for all the questions, but more specifics can help a lot!  Let me know.
